name: The Bridges of Múr and the Endless Sea - Reference Cards
name_original: The Bridges of Múr and the Endless Sea - Reference Cards
description:
The Bridges of Múr and the Endless Sea - Reference Cards + Climb, Fall, Conquer playing cards  is an optional supplement to The Bridges of Múr and the Endless Sea Campaign book.

This is a set of 128 tarot sized cards that provide easy to access reference information and additional lore, story hooks and motivations for many of the characters, creatures, equipment and scrolls in The Bridges of Múr and the Endless Sea  campaign book.

Inside this document you will find:

- 128 tarot sized cards formatted for easy printing and sleeving

- 8 ability cards to be blessed or cursed with a new skill

- 20 unique humanoid characters for your PCs to interact with.

- 5 Devourer cards for quick reference during play

- 7 strange mounts that offer a few new ways to navigate the dying lands

- 26 powerful creatures to encounter

- 4 scrolls specialized for traversing inhospitable landscapes

- 5 strange weapons

- 3 new types of armor

- 17 obscure pieces of equipment

- An abridged pdf copy of Climb, Fall, Conquer so you can learn to play

- 30 cards dedicated to creating unique area types to explore while climbing giant monsters

- 10 devourer reactions cards for use with the mini game Climb, Fall, Conquer   

40 of the cards in this set are not reference cards but instead cards used to play the minigame Climb, Fall, Conquer that is found in The Bridges of Múr and the Endless Sea. They allow a GM to quickly and easily generate a giant beast known as a devourer. Players are tasked with navigating across the body of the  massive creature to find it's weak points and eventually take it down.

The Bridges of Múr and the Endless Sea - Reference Cards + Climb, Fall, Conquer playing cards is an independent production by Alex K. Barton of newyear Studios and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.
